description: Chad lets us play morning voyeur, beginning his day in front of our camera, wearing nothing but a towel and having coffee. This sparkling eyed Southern boy has a cleft in his chin so adorable, and an ass so tight, we couldn't decidewhich one we'd like to kiss first. He decides to have a bit of fun in the kitchen, pulling down a naughty mag he has tucked on top of the fridge. He plays a bit, teasing us with what lies beneath that blue towel, eventually allowing that throbbing member to poke through the opening just enough to make our mouths water.He lets us follow him to the shower, making sure we get a good long look and that delicious derriere as he gets the water temperature just right. When Chad lathers up, running that bar of soap over those beautiful abs, let's just say the only steam in the room wasn't coming from the shower! The look on his face as he leans against the tile and unloads all over that tight tummy, tells us it was the perfect way to start the day.
title: Early To Rise, Scene #02
